title: Luke Coles And The Flower of Chiloe
description: Luke Coles does not remember his past, where he is from or who he is. After the Battle of Gettysburg, he searches for a home in the old west. Eventually, he finds work as a miner in Mexico and makes a life for himself.Then he discovers a new world, a supernatural one. His awareness of the monsters around him causes him to flee. On Chiloe Island he hopes things will return to normal.There, a merchant's daughter catches his eye. Just when he thinks things have returned to normal, the paranormal world sucks him back in. It is then that he finally begins to realize his destiny in a world full of mythological creatures and magic.After 150 years of preparation he is finally ready to face the demons from his past.
author: Josh  Walker
